var s = JSON.parse(source.getVariable())

server = s.server? s.server: source.variableComment.split("\n")[0];

   book.putVariable("custom", JSON.stringify(s, null, "\t"));
   s.st = 0
   source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(s, null, "\t"));
}

var modeTips = {"3": "\nğŸ“– å°è¯´æ¨¡å¼","2": "\nğŸ§ å¬ä¹¦æ¨¡å¼", "8": "\nğŸŒˆ æ¼«ç”»æ¨¡å¼","11": "\nğŸ¬ çŸ­å‰§æ¨¡å¼"};

function get(index) {
    var currentMode = s.st || 0;
    var modeTip = modeTips[currentMode] || "";
    
    if (currentMode == 2 || currentMode == 3) {
        var v = (book.getVariable('custom') != "") ? book.getVariable('custom') : source.getVariable();
        try {
            var szStr = JSON.parse(v).sz;
            var sz = parseInt(szStr, 10);
            if (sz < 0 || sz >= model.length) {
                sz = 0;
            }
            var show = modeTip + "\nå½“å‰éŸ³è‰²ï¼š";
            java.longToast(show + model[sz][0] + "\néƒ¨åˆ†ä¹¦ç±æ”¯æŒçœŸäººå‘éŸ³");

            java.longToast(modeTip + "\nè·å–éŸ³è‰²å¤±è´¥ï¼Œä½¿ç”¨é»˜è®¤ã€‚");
        }
    } else {
        java.longToast(modeTip);
    }
}




function getTones(tones, run) {
    if (run == 0) {
    var voiceTones = tones.split(',').map(function(tone) {
        var voice = model.find(function(item) {
            return item[1] == `tone_id=${tone}`;
        });
        return voice ? voice[0] : '';
    });
    return 'ğŸ¼ éŸ³è‰²æ”¯æŒï¼š' + voiceTones.filter(Boolean) + '\n\u200b\n';
    } 
  return ''
}

var Res  = JSON.parse(result);
var data = Res.page || Res.data;
data = (Array.isArray(data) ? data[0] : data.book_info) || data;
var type = data.genre;
java.put("type",type);
get(type);
var tts_info = getTones(data.tones, data.genre);
java.put("tts_info", tts_info);
JSON.stringify(data);

ruleExplore.author: author||copyright
ruleExplore.bookList:
<js>
let list = [];
let resultData = JSON.parse(result);

let targetData = resultData.data || resultData.list || resultData.book_list || 
                resultData.publication_list || resultData.result || resultData;
           
if (targetData != null && targetData.book_shelf_info) {
    let bookIds = targetData.book_shelf_info.map(item => `{"book_id": "${item.book_id}"}`).join(',');
    
    let booksData = java.ajax(
`https://fanqienovel.com/api/bookshelf/multidetail,{"method": "post","body": {"books":[${bookIds}]}}`
        );
    
    let books = JSON.parse(booksData).data.detail_list;
    for (let i in books) {
        let d = books[i];
        list.push({
            src: d,
            book_name: d.book_name,
            author: d.author,
            category:d.category,
            tags:d.tags,
            word_number:d.word_number,
            lastChapterTitle: d.last_chapter_title,
            abstract: d.abstract,
            book_id: d.book_id,
        });
    }
} else {
    list = targetData.content || targetData;
}

JSON.stringify({data: list})
</js>
data.data||data.list||book_list||data.publication_list||data.result||data||data..video_data[*]||data.book_info[*]||data..book_data[*]
ruleExplore.name: book_name||bookName||title

ruleSearch.author: author||$..copyright
ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
let list = [];
let book_list = [];
let res = JSON.parse(result);

try {
  if (res.data.search_tabs) {
    for (let i = 0; i < res.data.search_tabs.length; i++) {
        let books = res["data"]["search_tabs"][i]["data"];
        if (books != null) list = list.concat(books);
    }
  }
} catch (e) {}

for (let $ of list) {
   book_list.push($.book_data ? $.book_data[0] : ($.video_data ? $.video_data[0] : $));
}

JSON.stringify(book_list)
</js>$[*]

if (type == 1) {

} else {

result
